values:
"Wayne?"
"Yeah?"
"What do you do if every time you see this one incredible woman, you think you're gonna hurl?"
"I say hurl.  If you blow chunks and she comes back she's yours.  If you spew and she bolts, it was never meant to be."

-Wayne's World 1991-

That's probably not the best analogy, but its just another version of a much older adage that goes as thus...

"If you love something, let it go.  If it comes back, it's yours."

I think it's kind of funny that this analogy focuses more on the person that's doing the letting go.  If there was ever some wisdom I needed it was a better perspective regarding this situation from the other side.  To put it more adequately...

"What does one do when let go, only to come back to a closed window?"

Basically, how do you go about loving someone that doesn't want you?  This is a really stupid question to most, and I can't say i'd blame them for thinking so.  But anyone that knows anything about me knows that I was let go recently, only to find that the person I came back to doesn't want me anymore.

Generally, someone in this situation would just get over it and move on with their life.  But once again, I can't seem to get around my feelings here.  I always thought there was a damn good possibility that Kat and I wouldn't work out.  And I figured that if things ever came to that, i'd be able to shake things off and move on eventually.  But I just can't seem to shake the feeling that this whole thing is just plain wrong.  The situation just isn't right, and I can't escape the thought that the whole thing could have been avoided through better communication.  Now I know that there's got to be something wrong with me.  I know that i'm not right in the head or something.  Basically here's how it breaks down...

Kat and I have been friends for five years or so...
We started off on a relationship after meeting for the first time back in October of 2005 (a little quick in hindsight)...
We called each other almost daily for about two years, stealing just about every chance we got to see each other in that time...
In November of this past year, as I was planning one of these trips, Kat came to the conclusion that we "weren't working out" as she put it.  Basically, a relationship that I put my heart and soul into was ending.  We agree that things weren't working as thus, and I begrudgingly give up the woman I love at her request...

Now i'll be the first to say that I knew damn well what I was getting into when I met Kat at Kent State University two years ago.  I knew I was forging a much more intimate bond with someone that until then I had only fantasized about in my wildest dreams.  I had never once thought that the two of us would ever actually meet.  After a little more time, I found myself falling deeply in love with someone that for all intents and purposes I never should have even known.  I was in heaven.  And as of this past November, my feelings had only grown most exponentially.  When shit hit the fan, as I should have known it would.  I expected that there would be pain.  But I expected pain the likes of which I had felt before when being dumped.  I knew it would hurt, but the pain I felt was beyond anything I had previously experienced.  To put it bluntly, my heart was shattered, not broken, but completely destroyed.  Since then, i've grown used to things without Kat's influence in my life.  I've become accustomed to living without her, or anyone for that matter.  But just because I can handle something, doesn't mean i'm happy with it.

I've had this journal for many years, and I really doubt anyone that was reading it in the beginning is still reading it now.  I've had a pretty eclectic update schedule, and have sometimes gone even years without an update.  To be honest blogging has never been a strong suit of mine.  I either can't find something I want to write about, or I just plain get caught up in real life too much to bother with blogging.  But there's one person that at least checks up on it every once in a while, and it's to her that i'm writing this most of all.

Kat, i've been having a hard time talking to you lately.  I can definitely say that last time we spoke I put my foot most expertly in my mouth.  If there's one thing I regret in life, it's not being able to stop myself from spilling everything to you that day.  I had a lot on my mind, and I still do.  But it's not fair of me to give you all of my baggage.  You said you missed me, I miss you too.  You said we need to be friends again, and there's nothing I agree with more.  But after two months of trying to let you go, i've discovered that I still love you very much.  But I know that I can't force you to feel the same way as I do.  If you want us to be friends, that's great.  I for one would love for us to be friends again.  To lie to you and say that I didn't want more for us would be terribly out of character.  However, if friendship's all you're offering, then i'll take what I can get.

I'm basically saying that I hate the way things ended, and that I want a second chance.  I can't make you give that to me, and I wouldn't put you back into the same situation again with me unless you were absolutely certain you wanted it.  But I can say that i'm buying another car when I get my taxes back.  I can say that i'm hoping to move to Monroe with Lisa and Jason.  I can say that I want to look into going to Monroe Community College and eventually transferring into University of Michigan because it's something i've wanted since I was 10.  And I can say that when I finally get myself together in some way or another, whether it's going to school and living with Lisa for a few years or getting a job in Monroe and finding my own place.  I would love nothing more than for the two of us to give our relationship a second try.

I would love to talk about us, but it's obvious that doing it on my terms isn't working for either of us.  So if you want to talk about things, when you want to talk about things.  You call, IM, text, whatever you're comfortable with and I swear that i'll try to think before I speak for a change.

This entry took me something like 45 minutes straight to write.  I hope the time I took to collect myself and my thoughts means something to you...

I saw this in another Livejournal (no doubt they'll know when they see it) and decided it might not be a bad idea to do one myself.  I thought at the time that a little introspection was in good order, but I did this a few weeks back.  I'm just kind of copy/pasting here, so stuff might not be perfect.  I don't think anyone's been reading Holders posts, but i'll continue those sometime next week or something...

So here it is, a list of 101 things you probably already know about me, but some of it's new even to myself.  I've wanted to do this for a few days, and I decided to go for it.  I tried to avoid time wasters, but some of them are there.  All in all it's probably not groundbreaking news or anything, but maybe some of you will read it and understand me a little better...

1.  I hate my name, but I can't bring myself to change it.
2.  My parents divorced when I was like, 11 or so, they're better off.
3.  I value my friends above just about everything.  They're the support that i've needed throughout the years.
4.  I've always been a pretty good liar, but if you know me its easy to tell when i'm bullshitting you.
5.  My grades started slipping when I moved to Lewiston because I just didn't care anymore.  But before that I was an honors student
6.  I've always loved doing creative things, drawing, writing, sculpture...
7.  Right now i'm thinking of getting a BA in English
8.  I know that probably won't get me anywhere in the world
9.  I've been thinking about moving out of state for months, the more time I spend here the more I hate it.
10.  I've never known how to give less than 100 percent of myself to something.  Sometimes it ends in me getting hurt.
11.  My family's a huge collection of basket cases, but I love them all very dearly.
12.  I learned the hard way what holding a grudge gets you when I lost my brother
13.  I don't think I have it in me to genuinely hate someone.
14.  My eyesight's not that good, and my glasses are fucked.
15.  I've never grown up past 12 unless I had no choice but to act my age.
16.  All of my favorite TV shows are either cancelled or syndicated.
17.  I was eight or so when I discovered I was a spoiled brat
18.  I'm glad things didn't stay that way.
19.  As much as I hate it here, i'll never regret coming.
20.  I've tried to live my life without any regrets, because they never seem to get you anywhere.
21.  I hate my job, it's taking too much out of my life.
22.  But I love all the people I work with these days.
23.  I sometimes enjoy pushing people's buttons just to get a rise out of them.
24.  I'm a very caring person, and i've always been that way.
25.  I love listening to obscure music, stuff from Germany and Japan is my favorite.
26.  I've gone from lower middle class, to no class, to lower class again
27.  My mom gives everything she can to keep us afloat, and someday I hope I can pay her back
28.  I'm doing this list because I saw someone else do it and thought it was a good idea.
29.  I've had people tell me I should act
30.  But i've always had more of a face for radio if you get my drift.
31.  I was a daddy's boy growing up, mostly because mom wasn't around enough.
32.  I'm a huge anime fanatic
33.  I someday want to work for Tokyopop or something on American anime and manga.
34.  I love Guitar Hero, but i've never really gotten that good at it
35.  I'm still better than most of my friends though.
36.  I used to live in front of the tv
37.  Now its mostly the computer
38.  Bruce Lee was my hero as a kid, and I still think he was the greatest man to ever live
39.  I give people a lot of crap about the shows they watch and such, but i'll check anything out at least once.
40.  I've read Yaoi (gay manga) and liked it
41.  I used to listen to Micheal Jackson as a kid
42.  I'm really happy I don't anymore.
43.  I'm a lot smarter than I look
44.  In high school people thought I was retarded
45.  It was because I would do stupid things to try to get people to like me
46.  I sometimes wish I could go back to high school again
47.  But I know I wouldn't do anything different.
48.  I talk everyone's ears off when i'm nervous about something
49.  I talk to myself sometimes about whatever's bothering me
50.  I honestly don't think anyone's going to read this far (if at all)
51.  I've smoked pot, I hated it
52.  But I have nothing against people that do it, just don't press me
53.  I've never been a drinker, but I do like a beer or two every now and again
54.  As a kid I was always giving people sage advice, some of my friends have thanked me for it down the line.
55.  I've always thought l33t speek was stupid
56.  I wish I could take advice as well as I give it.
57.  I like just about anything that dangles
58.  I keep my wallet on a chain because I think it looks cool.  It's also much harder to lose that way
59.  My dad's side of the family is a bunch of rednecks, and I love them all dearly
60.  There's nothing you can say to me about my last name that I haven't already heard at least once.
61.  I try my best to keep my word, its the only thing any real man has.
62.  I'm a complete slob, mostly because I hate cleaning up after everyone else.
63.  I like cooking, as long as I don't have to clean.
64.  When i'm working with money (or something similar) I freak if it's not all facing the same way.
65.  I've accepted money to shut up before
66.  Easiest dollar i've ever made
67.  I've always had a problem with people that don't work hard to get where they are in the world
68.  I believe in karma, and destiny
69.  I also believe in the supternatural
70.  Since we're talking about beliefs, I also believe in God, but I despise organized religion.  Eveything has some clause that basically reads "Do it my way or burn in Hell"  And I can't stand that.
71.  That usually gets me on a lot of people's shit lists.
72.  I've never really had a shit list, but sometimes I think about who would be on it.
73.  I have ecclectic tastes in music, but I mostly listen to rock
74.  I have a hard time thinking of shows I like that aren't animated
75.  I never labled anyone when I was in school.  Labels don't do any good, they're limiting.
76.  I know there's probably a bunch of grammatical errors and such in here, but I can't be arsed to find them all.
77.  I'm actually very scared of my future, but i'm going to give it my best because so many people believe in me.
78.  I started reading fantasy novels when I was 12, and i've been hooked on them ever since.
79.  I've read all the Harry Potter books, but never owned them.
80.  My surname (last name) is German, and i've always been interested in that.
81.  I have a very real fear of being eaten alive by zombies
82.  So I like to watch a lot of zombie movies.
83.  My copy of "The Zombie Survival Guide" is doggeared from many readings.
84.  I took drafting courses in high school, but I never really went anywhere with them
85.  I've let my drawing slip a lot this past year or so, i'm trying to get back to where I was and beyond.
86.  I respect anyone that can play a musical instrument well.
87.  I've never met anyone famous in my life, but i'd love to change that.
88.  Generally, I try to look beyond the norms for friends and such, those people are always more interesting.
89.  If I ever won a trip to Japan i'd probably shit myself with glee
90.  I used to drive my Economics teacher nuts because I hated George W. Bush
91.  I think this country needs to remember where it came from, there's too many people here that forget we're about acceptance and tolerance.
92.  There was a time I toyed with moving out of the country, but I think I would miss too many people from here.
93.  I'm listening to Coheed and Cambria as I type this, and yes I know they sound like Rush.
94.  I have a guitar, but i've never learned how to play it properly.  I'd love to learn someday.
95.  I'm not happy with my life right now, and i'm hoping to change it with the new year.
96.  I like to sing whenever possible, and people tell me i'm good.
97.  I like to be surprised, but i'm very jumpy.  So don't expect me to take it too well.
98.  I'm a lovesick fool and I know it.  But I don't know how to stop, and I don't want to.
99.  I never made it all the way through "Lord of the Rings" but I do have the complete trilogy.  I've also read "The Hobbit"
100.  I'm jealous of someone i've never met because he has everything in life i'll ever want.
101.  I'll be surprised if anyone reads this entire list.

So there you have it, a short list of 101 things about me that you probably could have guessed.  Some of it though came to me as I underwent a little deep thought about myself and my life,  but most of it's common knowledge.  To anyone that actually reads this whole thing, i'm glad you wanted to take the time to get to know me a little better.  IM me sometime and maybe I can get to know you as well.

More holders, at least it gives me something to post to my lj other than my stupid musings...

Holder of Rage

In any city, in any country, go to any mental institution or halfway house in you can get yourself to. When you reach the front desk, ask to visit someone who calls himself "The Holder of Rage". The person will appear shy as they show you to a door, and then walk away. When you enter the door, you will be looking down a staircase that descends into darkness. As you descend the stairs, you will begin to hear screams. The screams will come from a throat of indeterminate origin.

If the screaming stops at any time, shout to the darkness "Resume your business! I do not wish to intrude!" If the screaming does not come back, there is nothing you can do, for you will be dead before you know what happens. If the screaming continues, you may move on.

Eventually, you will see light coming through the cracks in a door. Go through this door and you will be in what appears to be a medieval dungeon. Hollowed out skulls filled with candles serve as lanterns, and skeletons line the walls. There will be a wooden table in front of a fire inside a fireplace. On this table is the severed head of a 4 year old girl, staring ahead with glassy eyes.

Step up to the table and look the head in the eyes. In a clear, commanding voice ask "Who will stop them from coming together?" The head will look you in the eyes and tell you the tale of a man. She will tell you his entire story, from his violent birth to what he is doing that very moment. His deeds will be recounted in horrifying detail. He is a murderer of which the likes have never been seen, and he is just as mad.

If at the end of the story, the head tells you "He is listening to our conversation," you will be dragged out of the room and never be heard from again. You will experience all of the most horrifying things ever conceived, and you will kept alive until you have experienced them all.

If she tells you he is elsewhere, he is now looking for you. He will not stop until you are dead or the objects come together. She will tell you to pick her up. Pick the head up by the hair and look at the table where she was. Sitting there will be a needle, covered in dried blood, semen, pus, and countless unidentifiable substances.

That needle is object is 21 of 538. The hunt has begun and the clock is ticking.

Holder of Chaos

In any city, in any country, go to any hospital and ask to visit the one who refers to himself as "The Holder of Chaos". The clerk will begin to shake his head and pound his fists upon the desk. Ask him thrice more and he will stand up quietly and lead you to a room with only one door, the one which you entered through. You must close your eyes, if you don't you will forever be stricken blind and the only thing you will see is a constant sight of utter chaos.

If you have closed your eyes in time, after an hour of standing in confusion, you will hear a soft voice call out, "Do you have them?" Do not answer this question. Instead, stomp your foot upon the floor seventeen times, you may then open your eyes. If you see a long, stretching field in front of you, then you have succeeded in the first half of your endeavor. If you see a fiery plain of death and mutilation, then it is too late for you. You will be devoured by your own thoughts of your greatest fears.

Walk towards the setting sun in the grassy field for one hour until you reach a tree with no leaves on its branches. As you get closer you see that the tree is constructed out of bones and it is surrounded in a pool of blood. Submerge yourself fully in this blood, and when you surface once more, you will feel a bone hand press something into your palm, it is a small vial. Drink from the vial and you find yourself standing in the lobby of the mental institution.

This vial is object 22 of 538. The hour is nigh and the demons are calling.

Holder of Hate

In any city, in any country, go to any hospital and ask to visit the "Holder of Hate." The attendant will give you a firm handshake, look you straight in the eyes, and say "It took you long enough." They will hand you a key to room 532 and tell you to go down the left hall.

As you walk down the hall you will hear insane cackling. Should it stop, yell "I do not fear you!" If it does not begin again, run as fast as your legs will carry you. Should it continue, keep walking. Stop when you reach room 532. The door will be covered in scratches, gashes and all manner of burns.

There will be a small, strangely unscarred glass panel in the door. Peer inside. If there is a figure standing with his back to you, retreat as quietly as you can. If the room is empty, unlock the door and enter. A red light will be shining out of the sole window in the room. Should you gaze out of this window your eyes will soon burst from your sockets and your screams will be your only utterance for all eternity. The room is small, the walls covered in blood, and a small cloaked figure sits in the middle. It will respond to only one question: "Why do they hate?" The figure's cloak will fly into the air revealing a grotesquely disfigured being. It will answer your question in horrific detail. Upon finishing the story it will collapse, as if a tremendous burden has passed from its shoulders, and crawl into the corner. You will begin to hear strange, unearthly shrieks from beyond the door. They will be getting nearer by the second. Your only hope is to wrap yourself in the cloak and hurl yourself out the red window. If you were not followed you will wake up on the lawn of the hospital the next day, wrapped snugly in the cloak.

The cloak is object 23 of 538. It will hide you from their hate.

Holder of Love

In any city, in any country, go to any hospital and ask to visit the one who refers to himself as "The Holder of Love". The legends of this Holder have been lost to all time, for no one has ever returned. Fear the love of the end times. If you can steel yourself to press forward alone and without guidance to meet this guardian, and ask the correct question, you will be rewarded with an object of protection both divine and demonic. You may survive the quest yet.

This object is 24 out of 538. It longs for the company of the rest.

Holder of Creation

In any city, in any country, go to any hospital and ask to visit the one who refers to himself as "The Holder of Creation". The clerk will look into your eyes, horrified, before standing up. She (and only a she) will lead you to the maternal ward, and push you into a locked door, which you will glide through. Once inside the door, there will be two doors, one to the left and one to the right. You must chose the one with which you are more accustomed to, with hand of guidance will lead you. You must touch the door handle, if light emits from the window, you must enter. If it doesn't, you must run into the other room, as far as you can, and you mustn't turn back for two weeks, sleep where you drop and do not trust anyone. Do not enter the sunlight, for if you shall you shall be destroyed where you stand.

Should the light emit from the window, enter cautiously as the room is filled with fetuses who have died, and young who never had the chance to live. There will be a young mother laying in the corner with a baby whose eyes which see eternity.

Face the baby, look directly into his eyes. You must ask him the question, "For why have we been sent here?"

The baby will move, and it will wrap around you, binding you and rending you into 5 pieces, yet you must take no heed to the pain or you will never be returned to your real form. After rending you, he will stare into your eyes, and you will see the beginning of the cosmos, instantly burning into nothing but ash and returning outside, exactly 1 day before the incident. You will have a book in your hands.

This object is 25 out of 538. This book yearns to return the other objects to it, and within holds the knowledge with to do so.

Another five entires into the saga of the holders.  I'll have more tomorrow as usual...

Today was the first day I got to really play with the new registers at Taco Bell.  Touch screens are fun.  Some of the older people working there had issues (Laura kinda freaked about drive taking too long) but I got used to it pretty quick.

Also, I finally got a hold of Lisa about moving today.  But I still walked away with little to no information.  She says she's going to call me tomorrow so that we can talk.  I'm kinda hoping I can get something cemented to move around the start of next year.

As for me, eh i'm doing okay.  I could be better of course, but i've adopted a bit of a "whatever will be will be" attitude.  I'm not hurting quite so bad, but I still miss Kat.  I miss the way we used to talk every night and whisper to each other about all the things we were going to do when we saw each other again.  I miss her laughing at all of my stupid little jokes and how she used to bring a smile to my face despite my bad mood.  But most of all, I miss my friend...

It's been really weird not being able to call when I have something I want to talk about with her.  But like I said before, i'm trying to give her the space she wants/needs.  I don't really think we should talk over the phone till I get moved in like January, but she's online like, all the freaking time.  Just because she has some things to work out doesn't mean we can't talk like friends should.  But i'm leaving that one up to her, it's her turn to make the first move I guess.  She seemed to think I was too forward last time, so i'm leaving the ball in her court.

What is it about writing that is so liberating?  A man can have a million and one thoughts colliding in his mind, but somehow writing turns them into something concrete and substantial.  It's almost as if writing down ones thoughts makes them somehow easier to understand, as though making them something you can analyze a little closer suddenly brings clarity to your musings.  I won't pretend that I can come close to understanding everything i've been through in the past few weeks.  I have a million feelings occurring all at once in my mind and body.  One moment, i'm okay with the state of things for the time being, the next, a little more true to myself as I feel miserable on a level i've never before experienced.  I imagine tomorrow will be little different, aside from work serving as an empty distraction from the real problems of my life.  But this much I do know, I was happier in the past two years than i've ever been in my life.  Everything was suddenly easier, and I felt like this great big misery weight was lifted off of my shoulders.  I regret not setting out to do something great with my life as of yet, and to be honest I still have very little on my mind in that regard.  Whether or not I go down in the books or not is irrelevant as it has always been.  And to be honest with myself I may never get out of the lower class rut I seem to have assigned myself.  But I do know that the world will continue its course despite my misery and hatred of myself.  So I encourage all who read this little introspection of mine to go out and live your lives.  I know I wish I would...

Ironically, I felt the need to come here after forever and a day.  Something at work yesterday prompted me to want to write down my feelings about this whole situation.  Those of you that read Kat's blogs here should know by now that she broke up with me recently, and i'll be honest, i'm not exactly taking it well.  To that effect, I did something I probably shouldn't have done today, I checked up on Kat's livejournal posts.  What I saw came dangerously close to making my cry harder than I have in the past two weeks.

Now truth be told, I love Kat to death.  If it came down to it I would put my life on the line for her in an instant.  But from the looks of things, she no longer wants anything to do with me.  She told be before not speaking to me at all this past week that I needed to let go of her and move on with my life.  But it's not as simple as that for me.  I've been trying to respect her wishes and give her the space she desires but it's harder than hell to give her that.  She wrote about how lonely she's felt over the past few months and it's only after reading it that I realize just how badly i've wronged her.  And it's only after reading this that I realize how lonely i've been as well.

I want nothing more than for Kat and myself to get back together, but some part of me can't shake the realization that it seems this is never going to happen.  I would like for us to at least remain friends, but just this past week has been maddening.  I've been surrounded by my closest friends all week long and yet i've never felt so alone in all my life.  I wake up in the mornings with no desire to get out of bed, and yet I know that life must go on so I do.  I willingly blind myself to how lonely I am and allow myself to feel hollow in its place.  So maybe Kat's right in letting a hollow little man like me go.  I just don't want to have to give this up...

I realize that any pain I feel today is my own fault, but I just wanted to see how she was doing.  She won't talk to me for fear i'll bring up the subject she wants least to talk about, but I feel like it's the one thing we need to talk about more than anything.  I want nothing more than to hold her and tell her how much I love and miss her.  But she feels that would accomplish nothing in the long run.

I was thinking at Wal-Mart last night about buying Kat a Christmas gift I spied on one of the shelves.  It's something I know she would like, and I really want to send it to her.  But I fear that she might find it more of a "please take me back" gesture than anything.  To be honest that's exactly what I want, but if neither of us is ready for it then the whole thing's accomplished nothing.

In short, I loved her then, I love her now, and I will always love her.

Kat, if you need to talk (about anything) you know how to reach me...

If there is one or more people on your friends list who makes your world a better place just because they exist and who you would not have met (in real life or not) without the internet, then post this same sentence in your journal.

Also note, I hate chain messages.  But this was for Kat...

Yesterday was my brother's b-day, and as such, I decided it would be best to celebrate it as he would have.  BY GETTING PLASTERED OFF MY ASS!!!  Which i'm ashamed to say happened rather quickly.  I was already passed out and puking by 11:30, and I still feel like shit after waking up this morning with a hangover.  What a rough day man, I feel like crap 25 hours later.  Note to self, please remember to never mix rum and vodka, especailly after eating some two or three bowls of chicken and dumplings.  Gawd did that look gross coming back up.  At least I have the ability to credit myself with the intelligence to remove my favorite shirt before I ralphed all over it.

In other news I get to go to Gaylord tomorrow and interview for a job at Taco Bell.  Even if I hafta drive myself to work every day it should only cost something around 25 to 30 bucks.  But the idea is that I can split gas with my sister's roommate and save us both a buttload.  That being said, i'm kinda nervous having never worked at a Taco Bell before.  Here's hoping that things there aren't much different than they were at Smitty's...

I've about had enough of this shit with Kat's aunt.  She's going out of her way to make her niece feel bad about caring about me and it's making me sick the lengths she's willing to go to to get her point across.  Here's what went down in a nutshell...

Kat, for reasons unbeknownst to even herself, felt the desire the other day to call up her aunt and invite her to have lunch with her at the olive garden, as was their custom when the two of them were getting along.  She was aprehensive about the whole thing, but really hopeful that it would go well, as was I.  So today the two of them met up, and everything started out ok.  The conversation went more or less well as long as they stayed a safe distance from any subject that Kat knew would cause problems (i.e. me).  But she mentioned her friend Jess's name, completely unrelated conversation point really.  But dear Auntie Adolph had no trouble turning the whole thing into a discussion about Kat biggest mistake of her life (me) and going deeper and deeper with the verbal shiv she created until she struck bone.  After Kat couldn't take it anymore, she kindly asked her to change the subject.  Surprisingly enough for both of us she did and the rest of the lunch went more or less without incident.  But our dear auntie had already done her damage...

Needless to say I was called as soon as Kat got home from the lunch, sometime around 3:00.  I wasn't home, but made a point to return the call asap, just like I always did.  Upon hearing how things went I was extremely pissed right the flaming fuck off.  How could someone that's supposed to love you so much have all this contempt after all this time?  It's as if Pat never even tried to let it go.  Now she wants Kat to dump me and admit that the whole relationship was a mistake so that they can be a big happy family again.  And here's the part that really sickens me, she knows that she has control over Kat because of the fact that she's family and she's fucking using it!  If I were there right now there'd be nothing to stop me from going comlpetely ape shit on everything that woman fucking holds dear and giving her a justifiable reason to hate my guts.  She's gotten to the point where she makes me fucking sick to just think of her.  Normally i'm very peaceable, but my patience is wearing thin on this one.  To be honest if she wants to hold a grudge so damn bad I think she should keep it to herself instead of taking out her hatred on people who want nothing more than to make things right.  Hate me you bitch and leave your poor niece out of it!  YOU WANT SOMEONE TO HATE YOU FUCKING CRAZY OLD BATTLEAXE?  COME AND FUCKING GET ME!!!

Man o man what a weekend i've had.  Kat came up to see me on Wednesday and just got back in about an hour before I started writing this.  The weekend was awesome, Kat practically ripped me in half... in a game of RISK that is ;) we hung out with my buddy Jason for a while the first few days.  Friday we kept pretty busy, set up tents in the back yard and hung out till something like 6 in the morning.  The next day we went tubing down the AuSable river, I got burned practically to a crisp despite putting on sunblock, also learned about Jason's interesting "rating" system.  Today was a bit of a bummer, nobody wanted Kat to leave.  Sadie even gave her all kinds of lovin' today.  Anywho, weekend was boss dude and i'd give my left for next weekend to be the same.

Hey journal!!!  Start recording my thoughts already!!!  What?  You mean I hafta type?  BUT THAT'S WORK!!!  jk guys, thought i'd pen an update about something that happened last night.  Ya see, I like sometimes to poke around on www.hourlydump.com and view the various media crud that gets dumped.  I spied a vid with my friends and a few chicks that were making out in public, and I do mean making out.  These two were seriously getting into it!  A couple of topless chicks in a parking lot (I think at a concert) literally tearing into each other.  I thought this was pretty awesome, and I got a kick out of it to boot.  Among other things that that stirred last night, we found a video that was even more interesting.  My friend Jason's grandad went up in a jet a few summers ago, and apparently he didn't take the g's very well.  Well, the video of the flight found it's way to the hourlydump website!  It was freaking epic!!!  He passed out three times in the course of a few minutes, the pilot had to keep him consious and wake him up constantly.  Jason was here to point out that it was his grandfather, and I thought it was the coolest thing ever to see someone that we knew online at a media website.  Anyway, I gotta meet a friend to watch a movie, so I should probably cut this short.  Here's hoping you have a good nap babe!!!  I love you!!!

Hey all, the whole two people that read my lj.  Just updating for the sake of updating for once.  Kinda a little bit of drama tho, get this shit.  My mom came home from work today, and I had done all the housework, sort of a sad attempt at making her happy.  But she goes on about my b-day gift, says she decided what she wanted to give me.  The gift of choice?  She intends to give me as much money as she can and sending me out the door into the real world.  After thinking about it for a little while, I figure that it would at least be a chance to finally try things my way.  So I called up my buddy Mike downstate and asked him about the job scene down in Detroit.  He told me about how his company's been hiring new people left and right because some place I can't remember right now decided to beef up their security detail.  I told him that if he needed anything out of me, for applications and such, I would be more than happy to give it to him.  Now the question is, do I wanna keep trying to find work up here till I move?  Or would it be easier to just hold off and wait till I get the frig out of dodge?  I think i'm at least gonna play this Bob's Corner angle I have here, and if I get hired, I could see holding off till the end of the summer to try to hold out on the money I can get till then.  Anyways, got some shit to do tomorrow and stuff, trying to get my computer up and running and the like.  Gotta take my comp up to my friend's parents tomorrow and see about getting my network and shit up, also, one of my sound drivers was deleted when my mom decided to give everything her own shot.  Fucked up my computer more than she thought.  Anyway, that's about all I can think of, and I should really get off of mom's computer.  Smell ya later!!!

Anywho, Kat sent me this quiz thingy and wanted to see how I did. I took it, mostly for something to do, and here's my results.

There, test taken. I was bored and stuffs, and it's like quarter after 2 here. Can't sleep since Kat's coming up tomorrow. Totally jazzed about that one. Can't wait to meet her mom and sis either.

I kid you not man, a few days ago I was practically ripped out of a restfull sleep when my mom's ranting through the house about how I need to get out of bed NOW because there's a state trooper on his way here to question me about all this business with Kat.  Needless to say, I freaked out, not because I was worried or anything, but I HATE cops.  The guy walks in as i'm getting dressed, and sees me walk out of my room into the bathroom to brush my hair and such.  Guy figures he has me more or less pegged.  He was really straight forward with me, gave me the plain out facts and what have ya.  Basically as long as I don't try to call Kat at her Aunt's or anything, there's about shit all she can do.  The rest of the day was spent going back and forth between my mom and Kat and trying to calm everyone down.  Kat knows her aunt better than I do, and she's been telling me that if she can at all, Pat's gonna ride this one out as far as she can.  I really just wish the woman would leave the two of us alone and give us a chance to be together, but I don't see it as being that easy.  I'm not usually up this early, but I had to drive my mom to work.  My damn car's crapped out on me like everything else I own, and my sister needs a ride to Atlanta later.  One of those little Tornado wrap thingys and some french vinilla coffee later and I find myself updating my lj at 8:30.  I called Kat when I got back from dropping off mom, it was only like, 7:00 so I figured we could maybe chat for a few minutes while she got ready for class, I forget what it's like to hafta scramble in the mornings since it's been a year since high school.  I kinda miss it to be honest, more because it would mean I wasn't quite so grown up if I still had to go to school ;).  Anyway, I ought to get offline so that my sister can get through and stuff.

Prolly been way too long since I last updated my lj here, been having these fits lately where I get online for a while and don't really do anything, just goof off for a minute and check my mail.  Thing is, I never seem to have anything else to do, so you'd think I would spend my entire life in front of this thing.  Funny thing is, I haven't.  I've been spending most of my days waking up way too late and calling my Kat, talking to her for hours on end has always been one of the greatest joys in my life, which is funny because I could never stand to be on the phone with any of my ex's for more than a few minutes.
Dear God I love this woman.  There's just nothing else to it, and that's all I can honestly say.  Ever since Kent i've been hungry like mad just to be near her, which is probably why I can stand to spend soo much time on the phone with her.  I'm just kinda, dying for contact.  That weekend was absolute bliss, and I want nothing more than for that to be everyday of the rest of my life (well, everything except all the sleep deprevation ;)).  She drives me nuts in the best possible way, and I wouldn't want it elsewise if I was promised a mint in exchange.  About the only thing I would change about our relationship is the distance.  It's almost maddening how far away the two of us are from each other, but lately it's been even worse because my car's out of commision.  DAMN YOU FUEL PUMP AND EXPIRED PLATES!!!  This thing with a job at AMI is looking to be a real fight in the making, mostly because mom said their doing everything they can to keep from hiring more people right now.  I got a call to make next Monday though to be certain.  Gonna set an alarm tonight and hopefully get up with it around 9 or 10 so that I don't sleep ALL day.
My latest creative endeavor is a project that i'm really just kinda collaborating on and editing.  One of my closest friends is working on an entry for Tokyopop Manga's Rising Star contest, and I have my eye on half of that 10,000 bucks.  The project's kinda going good, but I won't be able to say until we get a few focused pages done and all.  I was up till 5 this morning writing ideas down.  Hopefully this'll get my creative juices flowing for my fanfictions and the like.  I wrote down a unch of notes on fantasy stuff too.  Who knows?  Maybe i'll find a use for them soon.
I kinda feel like i've been going nowhere lately.  Mostly because I really haven't been going anywhere.  I lost my job, (which was kinda a blessing in disguise) and since then haven't really had any ambition as to going to college or whatever.  It kinda scares me how quickly and easily I slipped into thinking that I could stand to work at that place forever as long as I was making enough to live off of.  God that's frightening.  Kat's been telling me lately that if I really want to go to college, I should put in a few apps and actually fucking TRY.  I know she's right, and I really want to do that.  I guess i'm kinda scared or something that i'll get shot down (my GPA wasn't that great in high) and besides all that, I haven't even taken the necessary tests and such.  Right now I don't even have the money to apply!  Let alone take one and do well, god I need to study or something and get my ass on track.  My fears about knowing what I wanted to do have more or less ebbed due to the fact that I was recently told something that must've slipped my mind.  It's altogether possible that I can take core classes and decide on a major y minor later.  I've been hinging on this whole AMI thing to provide with the money i'm gonna need to get going, I mean, 250 plus with no bills every week is gonna add up really quick.  I just hope I can work hard enough to keep the job for more than a week.
Anywho, mom's gonna be coming home soon so I should prolly get off the damn computer and do the dishes or something.  This Pepsi's looking a little neglected too.  Hope someone reads this, or it's more or less pointless.  I love you Kat, i'll talk to you tonight hun.

I RETURN!!!  *laughs* i'm in a much better mood since my many months long sabatical.  I needed to get in touch with a few things I guess, plus I have a lot of internet stuff going on at once and haven't thought of posting here in a long while (I tell no lies).  But a hell of a lot has happened since I last posted, summer has indeed come and gone, and now a balmy fall breeze has found it's way to my doorstep.  I'm in the middle of my 9th semester of highschool and i'm trying desperately to get all my ducks in a row before January when I graduate.  Still a jobless slob, but i'm gonna try to change that with the driver's license here soon.  Still have a deep love for a certain feline, but for some odd reason it's been harder to reach her these days.  I wonder if the realization that life exists beyond this mindless box will someday come to me as it has to her.  I have realitively easy days as far as school goes, three classes a day, mostly electives.  It doesn't hurt that i'm only there till Jan either, but it's making me a little paranoid that i'm gonna hafta grow up more to accomodate a real life.  Gonna get all cosmetic again and talk about the perm and shit that happened to my hair last night.  Mom's idea, but it worked out rather nice.  Also debating over piercing my ear again.  More happened over the summer, but I choose not to revisit that right now, maybe later eh?

It's all fun and games till someone finds the bodies...

Haven't been here in ages.  There's just too much shit going on right now.  I've been in a practical stupor for ages, and I probably will stay that way until I get the hell outta here.  I gave up on Ohio, (moving there) at least for a while anyway.  I plan on going back to Detriot, perhaps tooling around there.  Hopefully going to college at some point (when I FINALLY decide what to do with my life).  but for now i'm too busy trying to finish highschool.  I haven't picked up a pencil in ages.  Probably couldn't draw again if I tried.  But it never hurts to try eh?  Anyway, i'm gonna try to touch the computer a little more often (especailly since summer's coming;)).  Anyone wants to chat you all know how to reach me no???

I never realized how boring the week gets.  This one's been driving me nuts!!!  It's mostly the weather methinks, shit keeps freezing back over!!!  Anyways, I ought to get to writing something this weekend, and as it appears my prior plans are falling through, that's a definite possibility.  The Knothole Network peoples are bound to be tired of waiting...  Anyways, I gtg now!!!

I'm in a pretty good mood all things considered.  My mom moved the computer into the living room, which is good, but it made for a very hectic day.  I've been meaning to write some more, but I keep forgetting about it or not being in the mood or something.  Which is kinda bad cuz I have a few fans that're looking forward to me finishing what all i've been writing.  I really should get to it, well, someone yell at me already!!!  Oh wait, you can't...  sorries, I dumb...

Most of this was random boredom, somebody talk to me already!!!

Well, I got my phone back.  And it looks like mom's going shopping tomorrow.  Hopefully she'll hook me up with some new jeans.  Black and baggy like I like em', but it probably won't happen.  I got my head butchered last night.  I only needed a trim, and since everyone else was snipping away and shit, I had mine done too.  The trouble is, my sister-in-law did it, and she dosen't cut hair too much.  I gotta get my mom to fix it and now it's all short again.  It kinda ticks me off.  My dad used to have long hair, and I can't seem to grow any at all.  I WANT LONG HAIR DAMNIT!!!  Anyways, gtg catch ya later!!!

My phone got cut off yesterday, now I don't make many phone calls, but I can't get on-line either.  (damn you dial-up) and I hafta put a bunch of stuff on hold.  Can't check my mail, can't update my fics or lj, things are gonna be kinda boring for a while...

On the up side, I got my schedule pretty well cemented for next year.  All I need is a license and then I can leave early!!!  YAY!!!

Man o man, never learn to swing dance.  I only managed to prove I have two left feet.  But I can slow dance pretty decent (just gotta get that spin down).  I know my mom's gonna want me to show her what I learned, then I can trip all over myself again...

Well, maybe we'll have the phone back on by the time I get home, after all, I can dream right?

I'll bet everyone expected a Valentine's Day post from me didn't they?  Well, I wasn't home for one, plus Valentine's Day isn't really my speed.  It usually serves to remind me of how lonely I am.  This year it carried a sense of urgency, like I needed to be with someone I loved, but I just couldn't get there.  There's nothing i'd love more right now than to curl up on a couch with that special someone and watch tv till we both fell asleep.  Tonight i'll be sleeping alone again though, and wishing there was someone next to me.  I'm such a lonely little boy, *laughs* not so little though.  I'll be getting my license in August hopefully, and then I can have some kind of life of my own.  Perhaps then I won't be so lonely eh?

I got mid winter break coming up in another week.  Can you believe its only one day?  I remember when midwinter break was a week long!!!  But then again, back then I didn't get the first day of hunting day off. (not that I care, i've never killed anything in my life.)  The people up here have some rather ignorant values, like they give the first day of Deer Seaqson off, but neglect Martin Luther King Jr. Day.  Personally, i'd rather get the day of for a symbolic act than solely to go shoot something.  Northern MI sucks, I wanna go back to Detroit.

Another boring week out of the way, and a week closer to getting my license.  Even though I gotta wait till July *growls*.  I get to go to Sec of State and drive on a permit for 30 days and then take the test.  I probably won't be able to drive until early August, that sux.  Anyways, I never did get around to doing anything I intended to this weekend, and that includes trimming my hair.  I suppose tying the phone up all day on the net kept me from getting any calls tho eh?  It's not all my fault, Beth came over and was on for like, four hours!!!  Sometimes I wonder about her.  I've done nothing important at all this week, I had a test or two, but nothing great.  Anyway, I got to get another week outta the way.  Maybe someday soon I can have a life of my own...

Well, today has been pretty mundane.  I got up, went to school, found out that the guy that had the pins I needed for my finger armor got them eaten by his fucking dog.  I was pissed about it, but I must admit it was kinda funny.  He's gonna be paying me back for it, and told me he'd get another one for free!!!  But I don't see that happening...  I went on through the day as normal, did all my boring ass work, and I just got home to my computer...

I wish I had somewhere to go, someone to hang out with.  Well, what i'm really looking forward to is a little day trip to visit a certain special someone. (or someones, you know who you are;))  But I need a license for that one, and I gotta wait till summer at least for that one.  This sucks, I should see if mom can take me to Sec of State to see what I can do about that.

Tomorrow's Friday!!! *screams in exitement*  There's supposed to be some kind of talent show tomorrow, but Mr Summampow said we're gonna have a snow day.  I got five bucks that says he's wrong tho.  There could be freaking fire and brimstone falling outside and we'd still have school.  I hope for once that i'm right about this one.  After all, five bucks is five bucks...

I gotta go get my hair trimmed on Saturday, I should probably check up on that appointment too.  I wouldn't wanna get screwed there.  Anywho, I got a lot left to do before I can start to have an actual life.  But i'm working on it...

I found out that my new Finger Armor (see last post) is held together with pins that had to be removed so that my friend could wear it to school.  I'm a bit peeved because he made it sound like he broke it (and i've been picking on him about it all day ;)).  But apparently he kept the pins by his dresser, which means I better get them tomorrow!!!  *laughs* what a pointless update.  That's what I get for doing it at school I guess.  About ten minutes left till class gets out and I have nothing to do.  I get to do a paper on Social Reformers over the weekend probably, I chose Martin Luther King Jr.  You'd be surprised what's out there about the guy.

Anyway, I should probably get off and get ready to go.  PEACE!!!

I got myself a hair appointment, kind of.  A friend of mine offered to trim my hair for me this weekend, Saturday to be precise.  I have what little hair I can pulled back in the hope that the tension might make it grow a bit more.  So far its not working, but it dosen't look too bad.  Hopefully I can get a bit more length  going on by next month.  I'll take a pic of it on Sunday.

I managed to find a real fun piece of finger armor.  I bought it off a friend for ten bucks, the retail was forty!!!  I just got all the little pieces and shit today.  I need to find some stuff to put it together with, but i'll ask my friend I bought it from tomorrow.  hopefully I won't hafta ghetto rig it.

I have nothing to do, and no one to annoy!!!  Can it get any worse?  Next thing you know my life is gonna totally suck!!!  Oh wait, it already does.  DAMN YOU!!!

Just kidding, but I am really bored.  I need something to do.  Someone IM me or something.  I really have nothing interesting to type about so i'm just gonna stop now.

I hope I got the right day.  Either way, happy birthday  girl.  Just remembered today was your birthday, lucky me eh?  I almost missed it.  Anyway, hope you had a great day.  I was thinking of ya, love you hun and have another awesome year on me.

And a boring one ot that.  My friends are either grounded or working, and I got no place to go.  Plus the roads are shitty so I doubt that mom would lend me the car even if I had a good reason to borrow it.  I may be able to get a ride somewhere if I asked nicely enough.  But I doubt that.  Damnit, it never works out the way I want it to.

Need to get a job, seriously.  Or at least I need some money.  I could use a trim, and a new earring would be nice.  Need to get off my ass and so some work.  Then go to Gaylord and buy some shit...  

Why can't I get a license?  It's because i'm black ain't it?  Oh wait, i'm not black.  Is it because i'm white then?  It because I never went through driver's ed.  Nope, got kicked out three of four days in.  And i'm still waiting on my license since then.  Or i'd have gone somewhere by now...

Anyway, my day would probably be less boring if I did some writing.  But I just can't seem to wanna do any.  Oh well, shit happens I guess.  Gotta go...

Man, what a boring day today was.  I had a snow day, but I didn't find out till after I was already dressed, so I had to wipe the gel and all out of my hair before I stripped down and went back to bed.  I woke up officially around 11:00 some where.  I didn't get out of bed till 12:00 to go eat.  Then I made the mistake of letting Beth play around with my hair.  She used damn near half od my gel and turned me into a freaking Oompa Loompa!!!  God I wish I had a camera then, It would've made a hysterical pic!!!  Other than that, a few phone calls and some surfing, I did nothing all day.  HOW BORING WAS THAT!!!  I got some stuff I should probably should do.  But anyone that knows me can tell ya i'm not gonna do it!!!  Bye all!!!

I only have two exams left!!!  Yayness!!!  It turns out the Algebra exam I was so worried about was a whole lot of nothing.  *laughs* Ain't that always the way?  I think I bombed my Spanish exam, but I ought to still pass the semester.  I don't hafta go to math no more!!! *dances and sings*

For the one or two of you that might care, the site that has my fics has moved.  The old address will be deleted in a few days, so I figured I ought to get the new one up here someplace.
http://www.knothole.info/fanfiction/
and from there you can read whatever I happen to finish, or perhaps I should start posting in chapters like everyone else.  It would make my life easier as the site's better designed for it.  Mzaybe i'll give that a try.  Anyways, I gotta run, lunch is ever closer.  Byeness!!!

And I get one night of salvation before the torture begins.  I'm going through hell in Woods because I don't really care about my project, but my teacher won't let me turn it in how it is.  He says I gotta finish it first, so that I can drop the class next week.  I think I might drop Spanish III too, I haven't been paying much attention in there lately, and Spanish II is a better deal.  Plus in my Spanish III slot I could take Sociology (sp?) and that sounds much more interesting.  But I don't know yet...

I found a website to post my fics!!!  At long last they're no longer exclusive to the FUS message board, which could go down at any moment when the Admin gets pissed.  There's only two fics of mine there, and I don't get my own archive or anything, but at least no one has to download.

go now, read and review!!!  My name is the same there as it is here, so I can't be that difficult to find.  And i'm writing again, so that works nicely.  I gotta get to work on a few things.

My brother and I almost got into it the other night.  he was pissed about some shit and I was egging him on.  He ended up slapping me and I nearly socked him in the eye.  He would've kicked my ass so bad, but luckily nothing happened.  My friend Glen said I should've hit him, but later he applauded my patience.  All in all a weird night for me.

That's about it for now, drop me a line or something, we'll talk, no big whoop.
